entrepreneurship.quote: The finest dozen computer scientists I know are all musicians
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: The key thing that comes true is that they had a variety of experiences which they could draw upon, in order to try to solve a problem or to attack a particular dilemma in a kind of unique way
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Leonardo da Vinci was a great artist and a great scientist
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Michelangelo knew a tremendous amount about how to cut stone at the quarry
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: The finest dozen computer scientists I know are all musicians. Some are better than others, but they all consider that an important part of their life. I don’t believe that the best people in any of these fields see themselves as one branch of a forked tree. I just don’t see that. People bring these things together a lot
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Anyway, one of our biggest challenges, and the one I think John Sculley and I should be judged on in five to ten years, is making Apple an incredibly great 10 or 20 billion-dollar company. ‘Will it still have the spirit it does today?’ We’re charting new territory
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: If Apple becomes a place where computers are a commodity item, where the romance is done, and where people forget that computers are the most incredible invention that man has ever invented, I’ll feel I have lost Apple. But if I’m a million miles away, and all those people still feel those things… then I will feel that my genes are still there
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: You know, Dr. Edwin Land was a troublemaker. He dropped out of Harvard and founded Polaroid
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: On Dr. Edwin Land: Not only was he one of the great inventors of our time but, more important, he saw the intersection of art and science and business and built an organization to reflect that
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: You need a very product-oriented culture, even in a technology company. Lots of companies have tons of great engineers and smart people. But ultimately, there needs to be some gravitational force that pulls it all together. Otherwise, you can get great pieces of technology all floating around the universe. But it doesn’t add up to much
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We did iTunes because we all love music. We made what we thought was the best jukebox in iTunes. Then we all wanted to carry our whole music libraries around with us. The team worked really hard. And the reason that they worked so hard is because we all wanted one. You know? I mean, the first few hundred customers were us
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: What are we, anyway? Most of what we think we are is just a collection of likes and dislikes, habits, patterns. At the core of what we are is our values, and what decisions and actions we make reflect those values
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Well, I was thrown out of school a few times
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Invest time in yourself to have great experiences that are going to enrich you
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I didn’t see it then, but it turned out that getting fired from Apple was the best thing that could have ever happened to me. The heaviness of being successful was replaced by the lightness of being a beginner again, less sure about everything. It freed me to enter one of the most creative periods of my life
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Much of what I stumbled into by following my curiosity and intuition turned out to be priceless later on
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: The key thing to remember about me is that I’m still a student. I’m still in boot camp. If anyone is reading any of my thoughts, I’d keep that in mind
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I think if you do something and it turns out pretty good, then you should go do something else wonderful, not dwell on it for too long. Just figure out what’s next
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Reed College at that time offered perhaps the best calligraphy instruction in the country… I decided to take a calligraphy class to learn how to do this. It was beautiful, historical, artistically subtle in a way that science can’t capture, and I found it fascinating. None of this had even a hope of any practical application in my life. But ten years later, when we were designing the first Macintosh computer, it all came back to me
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We wanted to more richly experience why were we were alive, not just make a better life, and so people went in search of things. The great thing that came from that time was to realize that there was definitely more to life than the materialism of the late 50’s and early sixties. We were going in search of something deeper
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Between my sophomore and junior years, I got stoned for the first time; I discovered Shakespeare, Dylan Thomas, and all that classic stuff. I read Moby Dick and went back as a junior taking creative-writing classes
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: You could get LSD fresh made from Stanford. You could sleep on the beach at night with your girlfriend. California has a sense of experimentation and a sense of openness – openness to new possibilities
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Human minds settle into fixed ways of looking at the world and that’s always been true and it’s probably always going to be true
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: There’s a phrase in Buddhism, ‘Beginner’s mind’. It’s wonderful to have a beginner’s mind
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I’m completely stunned. I’m 19 years old, in a foreign country, up in the Himalayas, and here is this bizarre Indian baba who has just dragged me away from the rest of the crowd, shaving my head atop this mountain peak. I’m still not sure why he did it
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I bought an apartment in New York, but it’s because I love that city. I’m trying to educate myself, being from a small town in California, not having grown up with the sophistication and culture of a large city. I consider it part of my education
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I used to think that technology could help education. I’ve probably spearheaded giving away more computer equipment to schools than anybody else on the planet. But I’ve had to come to the inevitable conclusion that the problem is not one that technology can hope to solve. What’s wrong with education cannot be fixed with technology. No amount of technology will make a dent
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: The most important thing is a person. A person who incites and feeds your curiosity; and machines cannot do that in the same way that people can
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: One of the saints in my life is this woman named Imogene Hill, who was a fourth-grade teacher who taught this advanced class. She got hip to my whole situation in about a month and kindled a passion in me for learning things. I learned more that year than I think I learned in any year in school
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I was pretty bored in school, and I turned into a little terror. You should have seen us in third grade. We basically destroyed our teacher. We would let snakes loose in the classroom and explode bombs
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: School was pretty hard for me at the beginning
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: My mother taught me how to read before I got to school and so when I got there I really just wanted to do two things. I wanted to read books because I loved reading books and I wanted to go outside and chase butterflies. You know, do the things that five-year-olds like to do. I encountered authority of a different kind than I had ever encountered before, and I did not like it. And they really almost got me. They came close to really beating any curiosity out of me
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Obviously, one of the great challenges of an education is to teach us how to think. What we’re finding is that computers are actually going to affect the quality of thinking as more and more of our children have these tools available to them
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I know from my own education that if I hadn’t encountered two or three individuals that spent extra time with me, I’m sure I would have been in jail
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: When you’re young, a little bit of course correction goes a long way. I think it takes pretty talented people to do that
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: If you just sit and observe, you will see how restless your mind is. If you try to calm it, it only makes it worse, but over time it does calm, and when it does, there’s room to hear more subtle things – that’s when your intuition starts to blossom and you start to see things more clearly and be in the present more. Your mind just slows down, and you see a tremendous expanse in the moment. You see so much more than you could see before
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Focusing is about saying no
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Just get rid of the crappy stuff and focus on the good stuff
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We try to focus and do very few things well. And focusing is hard because focusing doesn’t mean saying yes, it means saying no. So we decide not to do a lot of things so we can focus on a handful of things and do them well
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Simple can be harder than complex: You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But it’s worth it in the end because once you get there, you can move mountains
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I have a very simple life. I have my family and I have Apple and Pixar. And I don’t do much else
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: My favorite things in life don’t cost any money
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Well, my favorite things in life are books, sushi and… My favorite things in life don’t cost any money. It’s really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time. As it is, I pay a price by not having much of a personal life. I don’t have the time to pursue love affairs or to tour small towns in Italy and sit in cafés and eat tomato-and-mozzarella salad
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I end up not buying a lot of things, because I find them ridiculous
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: The way we’re running the company, the product design, the advertising, it all comes down to this: Let’s make it simple. Really simple
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Look at the design of a lot of consumer products – they’re really complicated surfaces. We tried to make something much more holistic and simple
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: When you first start off trying to solve a problem, the first solutions you come up with are very complex, and most people stop there. But if you keep going, and live with the problem and peel more layers of the onion off, you can oftentimes arrive at some very elegant and simple solutions. Most people just don’t put in the time or energy to get there
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We believe that customers are smart and want objects which are well thought through
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: What I found when I got here was a zillion and one products. It was amazing. And I started to ask people, now why would I recommend a 3400 over a 4400? When should somebody jump up to a 6500, but not a 7300? And after three weeks, I couldn’t figure this out
entrepreneurship.author: If I couldn’t figure this out… how could our customers figure this out?

entrepreneurship.quote: Apple is a $30 billion company, yet we’ve got less than 30 major products. I don’t know if that’s ever been done before. Certainly the great consumer electronics companies of the past had thousands of products. We tend to focus much more. People think focus means saying yes to the thing you’ve got to focus on. But that’s not what it means at all. It means saying no to the hundred other good ideas that there are. You have to pick carefully
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We’re always thinking about new markets we could enter, but it’s only by saying no that you can concentrate on the things that are really important
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: People love chopping wood. In this activity one immediately sees results
entrepreneurship.author: Albert Einstein

entrepreneurship.quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook
entrepreneurship.author: William James

entrepreneurship.quote: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away
entrepreneurship.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

entrepreneurship.quote: Clutter and confusion are failures of design, not attributes of information
entrepreneurship.author: Edward Tuft

entrepreneurship.quote: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away at the unessential
entrepreneurship.author: Bruce Lee

entrepreneurship.quote: Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We had a fundamental belief that doing it right the first time was going to be easier than having to go back and fix it. And I cannot say strongly enough that the repercussions of that attitude are staggering. I’ve seen them again and again throughout my business life
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We’re not going to be the first to this party, but we’re going to be the best
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: There’s some stuff in our industry that we wouldn’t be proud to ship
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: If they are working in an environment where excellence is expected, then they will do excellent work without anything but self-motivation. I’m talking about an environment in which excellence is noticed and respected and is in the culture. If you have that, you don’t have to tell people to do excellent work. They understand it from their surroundings
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: I have to tell you there’s some stuff in our industry that we wouldn’t be proud to ship, that we wouldn’t be proud to recommend to our family and friends. And we can’t do it, we just can’t ship junk
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We think the Mac will sell zillions, but we didn’t build the Mac for anybody else. We built it for ourselves
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: We were the group of people who were going to judge whether it was great or not. We weren’t going to go out and do market research. We just wanted to build the best thing we could build
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Oh wow. Oh wow. Oh wow

entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Productize yourself
entrepreneurship.author: Naval Ravikant (See also: Productize Yourself, 2 minutes YouTube video)

entrepreneurship.quote: Make yourself useful
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: You are a niche of one
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Only the paranoid survive
entrepreneurship.author: Andy Grove (Intel)

entrepreneurship.quote: Value is created by doing
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman

entrepreneurship.quote: Make something people need
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman (Not something people want)

entrepreneurship.quote: Your life is a sales pitch
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: An artist has only one critic
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurs, just keep going
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: The shortcut: Take the long way
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher (See also: never give up quotes)

entrepreneurship.quote: Lack of time is lack of priorities
entrepreneurship.author: Tim Ferriss

entrepreneurship.quote: Degrees are not useful. Skills are
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Traction plus vision is unstoppable
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Don’t be the best. Be the only
entrepreneurship.author: Kevin Kelly

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship ain’t for everyone
entrepreneurship.author: Ed Latimore

entrepreneurship.quote: Focus on what matters. Cut all the BS
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman

entrepreneurship.quote: You need to pave your own way in the world
entrepreneurship.author: Lori Greiner (Shark Tank)

entrepreneurship.quote: Build things you wish people built for you
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Every true artist is at war with the world
entrepreneurship.author: Anthony Kiedis (Red Hot Chili Peppers)

entrepreneurship.quote: Ideas are the strongest things of all in history
entrepreneurship.author: Will & Ariel Durant

entrepreneurship.quote: Experiment and tinker — take lots of small risks
entrepreneurship.author: Buster Benson

entrepreneurship.quote: You don’t achieve anything great without breaking rules
entrepreneurship.author: Kamal Ravikant

entrepreneurship.quote: Founders who live in the future have the best chance of winning big
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: Make it happen now, not tomorrow. Tomorrow is a loser’s excuse
entrepreneurship.author: Farrah Gray

entrepreneurship.quote: Worse writers than you have written and published books. Worse founders than you have built successful businesses. If they can do it, you can too
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: What can you write that no one else can write? Write that. What can you say that no one else can say? Say that. What can you build that no one else can build? Build that
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: The risk takers of the 16th century were scientists, but then science became an institution. The risk takers of the 20th century were social activists, but social justice became a culture. The risk takers of our time are entrepreneurs. All progress depends on the risk takers
entrepreneurship.author: Johnny Uzan

entrepreneurship.quote: Every problem has a solution — there’s always a path through
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: Every restaurant you ate at, every car you’ve drove, every book you’ve read, every movie you’ve watched, every podcast you’ve heard, started as an idea in someone’s mind, then they made it appear. They aren’t smarter, luckier or better than you, they just took a chance on themselves
entrepreneurship.author: Chris Johnson

entrepreneurship.quote: Your product is imperfect. Your team is imperfect. You are imperfect. That’s precisely why you keep building. Why stop now? There’s so much left to do and experience. It’s time to test yourself – to walk through the forest of impossibility. That’s entrepreneurship
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Real entrepreneurs don’t ask for permission to build product, recruit a team and raise money. They just do it
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Personal expression drives more creative energy than money ever can
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Always do the simplest thing that can possibly work
entrepreneurship.author: Thibaut

entrepreneurship.quote: If you can’t find what you’re looking for, maybe you should create it
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Everything can begin with you. You are the foundation of any change that will happen in your society
entrepreneurship.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

entrepreneurship.quote: Focus on doing one thing. Really well. As specific as possible. Don’t over-intellectualize it. Just make something people want
entrepreneurship.author: Daniel Gross

entrepreneurship.quote: Founders: Your job is to retain yourself. It’s a marathon, not a sprint. You need to set things up so you are comfortable enough to run the distance
entrepreneurship.author: Justin Kan

entrepreneurship.quote: You have a unique perspective, a unique way of seeing the world. You have a history. Use this, and make the thing that only you can make
entrepreneurship.author: @gumroad

entrepreneurship.quote: Find something you love and do it better than everyone else
entrepreneurship.author: Gurbaksh Chahal (RadiumOne)

entrepreneurship.quote: One man’s problem is another man’s opportunity
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Those with brains and balls become artisans/entrepreneurs
entrepreneurship.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

entrepreneurship.quote: If you don’t have a problem it doesn’t matter how good the solution is
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: If a user whispers, listen. If a user screams, walk away. If a user says nothing, cry
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: The hardest part in a startup is that you wake up one morning, and you feel great about the day, and you think, "We’re kicking ass." And then you wake up the next morning, and you think "We’re dead." And literally nothing’s changed
entrepreneurship.author: Joe Kraus

entrepreneurship.quote: My favorite quote about entrepreneurship is that to understand an entrepreneur, you should study a juvenile delinquent. They’re both saying: "This sucks and I’m going to do it another way." You have to want to break the rules and prove that your way works
entrepreneurship.author: Yvon Chouinard (Patagonia)

entrepreneurship.quote: If you’re an entrepreneur and you think that the president makes a difference to your business, you should stay at your current job
entrepreneurship.author: Guy Kawasaki

entrepreneurship.quote: 1. Fish. 2. Teach people to fish. 3. Build better fishing rods
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Your imposter syndrome will fade when you realize how average your heroes are. Your excuses will fade too
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Good employees make bad entrepreneurs
entrepreneurship.author: Angela Jiang

entrepreneurship.quote: But as an entrepreneur you have to feel like you can jump out of an aeroplane because you’re confident that you’ll catch a bird flying by. It’s an act of stupidity, and most entrepreneurs go splat because the bird doesn’t come by, but a few times it does
entrepreneurship.author: Reed Hastings (Netflix)

entrepreneurship.quote: You could read all the business books in the world but still not know how to build a company. You don’t know shit until you throw yourself into the fire
entrepreneurship.author: Preethi Kasireddy (TruStory)

entrepreneurship.quote: For every successful entrepreneur you hear about on TV, there are 999 failed one eating canned sardines for dinner
entrepreneurship.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

entrepreneurship.quote: Great opportunities never have "great opportunities" in the subject line
entrepreneurship.author: Scott Belsky (Behance)

entrepreneurship.quote: One of the greatest gifts as an entrepreneur is you get to see the future in the present
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Your product should be a reflection of you. An expression of your beliefs, experiences and dreams. If it isn’t, either you are building for someone else or even worse, to be like someone you are not. Let your spirit shine through your product
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs
entrepreneurship.author: Farrah Gray

entrepreneurship.quote: Some people consume, others create. Some people complain, others solve. Some people feel trapped, others seek freedom
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: Every great entrepreneur is tormented by the scarcity of time
entrepreneurship.author: David Perell

entrepreneurship.quote: You underestimate how many things you know that other people wish they could learn from you
entrepreneurship.author: David Perell

entrepreneurship.quote: The desire for independence is common. The tolerance for instability is rare
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: You don’t need a bigger audience. You need a better product
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: The inauthentic chase the market. The authentic are chased by the market
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: If you’re not building your own assets, you’re building someone else’s
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: It’s not about getting good, it’s about getting different. Getting "good" is what you have to do when you play other people’s games. Getting "different" is what you have do when you play your own
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Fail by chasing trends, succeed by pursuing sincere interests
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: So many businesses go bankrupt because they are essentially trying to fix problems that real people don’t actually have
entrepreneurship.author: Alain de Botton

entrepreneurship.quote: There is no syllabus for an entrepreneur. School and startups are opposites
entrepreneurship.author: Michael (@mmay3r)

entrepreneurship.quote: When you build product, you store the value of your time in an asset you own. When you sell your time, you store the value of your time in an asset you don’t own. Value your time. Build assets you own
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Prioritize that which compounds
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Building a product is about fighting the insidious disease of more. More features, more fluff, more everything. As a builder, you have lost the naïveté of a beginner’s mind. The more phenomenon is rooted in fear. You’ll never defeat more, but you can contain it with awareness
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: The way to become a successful entrepreneur is to make something people want, and the best way to do that (especially if you’re young) is to start by asking what you yourself want
entrepreneurship.author: Paul Graham (Y Combinator)

entrepreneurship.quote: People don’t want to use your software. They want to lose weight, laugh, be entertained, get smarter, spend time with loved ones, go home on time, sleep adequately, eat good food, be happy. Your product is only as good as the experiences it enables people to have
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: An entrepreneur not willing to disclose their ideas is like a comedian not willing to tell any jokes
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Being a founder is great for personal growth, because if you don’t grow your business dies
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: It doesn’t matter how fast you move if it’s in a worthless direction
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman

entrepreneurship.quote: When failure is expensive, plan carefully. When failure is cheap, act quickly
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: Before you can build a business that helps people, you must become a person who helps people
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: The wiser you get, the less you do it for money
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: The simpler the system, the more consistent the result
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Don’t explain what you’re capable of. Explain what they’re capable of because of you
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Use the hours you’re not getting paid by the hour to figure out how to stop getting paid by the hour
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: To practice any art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow. So do it
entrepreneurship.author: Kurt Vonnegut

entrepreneurship.quote: A simple question to help you focus on the highest value tasks: "What is the work that keeps working for you after you’ve completed it?"
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: One can optimize for productivity or one can optimize for creativity, but it’s hard to do both
entrepreneurship.author: Naval Ravikant

entrepreneurship.quote: Part 1. No meetings before 11am. No meetings when emails or calls will do. Don’t schedule calls, text coordinate them on the fly when possible. Cram all meetings into two days a week. 1-on-1s are usually 30-minute walking meetings. Meetings are the death of productivity
entrepreneurship.author: Naval Ravikant

entrepreneurship.quote: Part 2. Delete emails without responding or flinching. Don’t set up voicemail. Don’t travel purely for business. Don’t go to conferences unless speaking. Eat dinner with friends or family. Use blocks of open time to create, make good decisions, and focus on important over urgent
entrepreneurship.author: Naval Ravikant (See also: focus quotes)

entrepreneurship.quote: In business, the best way to understand millions of potential customers is to understand oneself. The best market research: introspection
entrepreneurship.author: Alain de Botton

entrepreneurship.quote: At the kernel of successful entrepreneurship lies something oddly more abstract: an accurate insight into the causes of human unhappiness. Every morally-minded business is in some way alleviating a particular kind of suffering
entrepreneurship.author: Alain de Botton

entrepreneurship.quote: Delaying gratification is one of the key factors for future success in product, entrepreneurship and life. To delay gratification means to be able to function under stress. Impulsivity is a cancerous state-of-mind designed to obliterate your ability to play the long game
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: The entrepreneurs I admire most think in terms of decades and measure progress hourly
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship is a search
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: An entrepreneur is someone who brings a pattern change
entrepreneurship.author: Bill Drayton

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship is so growth-inducing because it forces you to take full responsibility for your own results
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship is a personal growth engine disguised as a business pursuit
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship is the most accelerated school you can attend. You’ll never learn faster than when you have to learn fast to survive
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: The best definition of entrepreneurship that I’ve come up with is this: Trusting that you’ll figure it out. The willingness to problem solve in the face of uncertainty, volatility, challenge, and chaos (and *feeling* all of those things) is what entrepreneurship requires
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: True artists and founders are original – they seek to create things that change the rules, rather than trying to follow them
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: Sound entrepreneurship doesn’t require radical invention: just selling something you love with slightly more passion that the norm
entrepreneurship.author: Alain de Botton

entrepreneurship.quote: To be an entrepreneur is to embrace the new over the familiar, the uncertain over the predictable, the volatile over the stable, the challenging over the comfortable, the chaotic over the orderly. Not an occupation, but a way of life
entrepreneurship.author: Johnny Uzan

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship is very difficult to teach because original thinking is very difficult to teach
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman

entrepreneurship.quote: It’s one thing to study entrepreneurship, and another to live the entrepreneur’s life
entrepreneurship.author: Shane Parrish

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship = Optimism x Execution
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship: the art of building what’s missing
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: The Internet is an audience of one, a million times over
entrepreneurship.author: Peter Guber

entrepreneurship.quote: The Internet turned everyone into an entrepreneur
entrepreneurship.author: Anthony Pompliano

entrepreneurship.quote: If you don’t know what company you want to start, the best thing to do is start writing online
entrepreneurship.author: David Perell

entrepreneurship.quote: Writing online is the seed of entrepreneurship. It teaches you how to clarify your ideas, make them useful, and distribute them to an audience. Same skills as building a business
entrepreneurship.author: David Perell

entrepreneurship.quote: My Twitter account is worth more than my college diploma
entrepreneurship.author: David Perell

entrepreneurship.quote: The Internet: the greatest tool ever created (for those who know how to use it)
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: Learn online. Build online. Sell online
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: When you make yourself the product, you have no competition
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Identify a problem. Design a process to solve it. Brand it. Automate it
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: On the Internet, you can build a cash-flowing asset from scratch. No permission required
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Promote yourself every single day. Promote your brand, promote your business, promote your side hustle, post your links, post your reviews, post your updates, post your products. People will either get inspired, join you, shop with you, learn from you or unfollow. Simple
entrepreneurship.author: Chris Johnson

entrepreneurship.quote: Reasons your product will fail: 1. Too complex 2. Can’t easily be described 3. Didn’t iterate fast enough 4. Bland 5. Failed to launch into a community 6. Doesn’t save time/money 7. Poor design 8. Does too much 9. Didn’t take a feature risk 10. Listened to wrong the customers
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard (See also: money quotes)

entrepreneurship.quote: If your consumer app isn’t being used while someone sits on the toilet, it’s probably not going to work
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: If you can’t identify the core use case of your product you don’t have one. If you can’t identify the core user of your product you don’t have one. If you can’t identify the core promise of your product you don’t have one. Check all 3 boxes, live to create another day
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: You can have a conversation with a few people at a time. Your blog posts can be read by thousands of people at a time. Your products can be used by millions of people at a time. Productize yourself to scale yourself
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Things you don’t need to launch your product: a great name, a one-word domain, a beautiful logo, an ever better website, brilliant copy, perfect code, custom illustrations, shiny buttons, optimized CSS… Things you do need: a product that solves a problem for someone. That’s it
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: The purpose of sharing your idea is to further understand it
entrepreneurship.author: Rick Rubin

entrepreneurship.quote: Put your work out there. You never know who’s watching
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: If you don’t think you’re ready to start a company, don’t worry, no one is
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Lack of knowledge is never an excuse. No one has a clue when they first start
entrepreneurship.author: Matthew Kobach

entrepreneurship.quote: An entrepreneur is someone who has a vision for something and a want to create
entrepreneurship.author: David Karp (Tumblr)

entrepreneurship.quote: A side hustle requires more discipline than a full-time hustle
entrepreneurship.author: Angela Jiang

entrepreneurship.quote: The best way to become an entrepreneur is to start as a solopreneur. You can test the waters, learn quickly, and start a following without the risks of a staff or investors
entrepreneurship.author: Tiago Forte

entrepreneurship.quote: In the beginning, you must begin. Most of us start in the same place: no money, no resources, no contacts, no experience. Start anyway
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: Things you don’t have to do to start a company: quit your job, learn to code, write a business plan, raise money, hire employees. Things you have to do: Start
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Make the expensive cheap. Make the inaccessible accessible. Make the complex simple. Make the difficult easy. There are opportunities everywhere
entrepreneurship.author: Sahil Lavingia

entrepreneurship.quote: Follow your curiosity. Things that seem exciting to you will often seem exciting to other people too
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman

entrepreneurship.quote: Most of the great startups come from a great insight, and a great insight usually occurs when someone is living in the future, and they notice something that’s missing
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: If your insight is powerful enough, it’ll naturally connect with somebody desperate — you’ll be solving a problem in a novel way that’s an order of magnitude better than any past solution
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: My advice for an entrepreneur just starting out is to differentiate yourself
entrepreneurship.author: Why are you different? What’s important about you? Why does the customer need you? Sara Blakely (See also: self-respect quotes)

entrepreneurship.quote: Be careful not to hire early employees that can succeed in a company but lack the artistic temperament for startup success. If your startup employees want clear performance guidelines, or to implement the ‘best practices’ from the last big tech company they’ve worked at, you’ve probably enlisted the wrong people
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: I’ve started multiple businesses based on what I think other people will like. They’ve all failed. The only ones I’m able to sustain are the ones that produce things I like
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Create value by reducing uncertainty
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Ignore building anything that’s not your unique differentiator. You’ll save time. You’ll save money. You can finally focus on what makes your product special and relevant
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Side projects create the greatest companies because they begin as freedom machines, labors of love and truth vehicles. Precious time is traded to pursue something pure
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: An entrepreneur is someone with faith in their ability to make something where there was nothing before
entrepreneurship.author: Ryan Holiday

entrepreneurship.quote: You’ll never see the whole path. Never. Just start
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: It doesn’t matter how good your ideas are if you can’t communicate them
entrepreneurship.author: Justin Kan

entrepreneurship.quote: People don’t desire products. They desire feelings that products give them
entrepreneurship.author: Thibaut

entrepreneurship.quote: Self-belief alone is not sufficient — you also have to be able to convince other people of what you believe
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman

entrepreneurship.quote: The person who can cultivate a sense of hope in others can sell almost anything
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: Good storytellers are more powerful than ever before. Technology has reduced the cost of sharing stories. One great story can move millions to act. Authors. Podcasters. Entrepreneurs. Politicians. Leaders. The person who tells the best story rules their corner of the world
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: Be specific or be ignored
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: To increase price, increase proof
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Don’t chase reach, chase resonance
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: To monetize, empathize
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Clarify your value, amplify your income
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Your prices reflect what you believe about your product
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: You are a good marketer to the extent that you can transfer belief
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Don’t market to change minds. Market to find people who already agree
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: No one cares what you can do. Everyone cares what you can do for them
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Complexity impresses your peers. Clarity impresses your customers
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Trust is a function of reputation. Show up every day and give without expectation
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Talk to that customer. You need to create a tight feedback loop between interviewing your customer and understanding their needs, then building and testing product iterations. The tighter the loop, the better
entrepreneurship.author: Justin Kan

entrepreneurship.quote: Like artists, great founders understand and empathize. They don’t just analyze or sell. That’s the reason why getting out of the building and noticing everything about your customer’s life as he/she experiences it is so important
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: If you don’t market yourself, no one else will
entrepreneurship.author: @LifeMathMoney

entrepreneurship.quote: You want to have a value proposition that’s so strong that the customers in your target audience would be irrational not to buy if they knew the truth
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: Be hyper-specific about who your customer is and serve that demographic like royalty
entrepreneurship.author: Noah Kagan

entrepreneurship.quote: I have never worked a day in my life without selling. If I believe in something, I sell it and I sell it hard
entrepreneurship.author: Estée Lauder

entrepreneurship.quote: Be transparent. People will trust you more
entrepreneurship.author: Preethi Kasireddy

entrepreneurship.quote: Work for your customer not your company
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: People are incredibly forgiving about what your product doesn’t have as long as you have that one great thing
entrepreneurship.author: Brian Norgard

entrepreneurship.quote: Great entrepreneurs are like artists — they move people beyond their logic
entrepreneurship.author: Mike Maples

entrepreneurship.quote: You’re authentic, stay it. You’re unique, show it
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: Find something you’re passionate about and keep tremendously interested in it
entrepreneurship.author: Julia Child

entrepreneurship.quote: Somewhere in the world, an unknown young person is probably starting a company now that will eventually be as big as today’s tech giants
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman (Y Combinator)

entrepreneurship.quote: To any entrepreneur: if you want to do it, do it now. If you don’t, you’re going to regret it
entrepreneurship.author: Catherine Cook (MyYearbook)

entrepreneurship.quote: One of the biggest disconnects between school and reality: schools give you credit for effort, but customers don’t. Young founders often get whiplash from this transition at YC. After 21 years of getting credit for effort, it suddenly stops
entrepreneurship.author: Paul Graham

entrepreneurship.quote: I want little girls to believe that they can be CEOs
entrepreneurship.author: Payal Kadakia (ClassPass)

entrepreneurship.quote: An important attribute of success is to be yourself. Never hide what makes you, you
entrepreneurship.author: Indra Nooyi (PepsiCo)

entrepreneurship.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them
entrepreneurship.author: Walt Disney

entrepreneurship.quote: It is within everyone’s grasp to be a CEO
entrepreneurship.author: Martha Stewart

entrepreneurship.quote: I don’t believe in failure. It’s not failure if you enjoyed the process
entrepreneurship.author: Oprah Winfrey

entrepreneurship.quote: If you believe so wholeheartedly in your mission, you will be able to overcome anything
entrepreneurship.author: Payal Kadakia (ClassPass)

entrepreneurship.quote: That emotional roller coaster is really tough to ride day in and day out, but it’s just part of reality. Knowing that, and realizing you’re going to get through this, and not letting that rattle you, that’s probably the most important thing I could tell any entrepreneur
entrepreneurship.author: Kim Polese (CrowdSmart)

entrepreneurship.quote: Define success on your own terms, achieve it by your own rules, and build a life you’re proud to live
entrepreneurship.author: Anne Sweeney (Disney)

entrepreneurship.quote: It’s important to be willing to make mistakes. The worst thing that can happen is you become memorable
entrepreneurship.author: Sara Blakely (Spanx)

If, at the same time, you demonstrate how enormously you value them, not just through compensation, but also verbally, every single day, and if you enable that talent to share in the profit that they help create for you, you’ll be successful. It’s so simple, and virtually nobody does it, because it requires a high-trust working environment, and most business environments are low-trust. In order to own the future of your business, you have to design it around trust

entrepreneurship.quote: Without labor nothing prospers

entrepreneurship.quote: I’m a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it

entrepreneurship.quote: If you’re changing the world, you’re working on important things, you’re excited to get up in the morning
entrepreneurship.author: Larry Page (Google)

entrepreneurship.quote: If you work hard and meet your responsibilities, you can get ahead, no matter where you come from, what you look like or who you love
entrepreneurship.author: Barack Obama

entrepreneurship.quote: It’s only a crazy dream until you do it
entrepreneurship.author: Serena Williams

entrepreneurship.quote: I never viewed myself as particularly talented. Where I excel is ridiculous, sickening, work ethic. You know, while the other guy’s sleeping, I’m working
entrepreneurship.author: Will Smith

entrepreneurship.quote: Choose a job you love and you will never have to work a day in your life
entrepreneurship.author: Confucius

entrepreneurship.quote: There is no substitute for hard work
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: Opportunity is missed by most because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: Being busy does not always mean real work. The object of all work is production or accomplishment and to either of these ends there must be forethought, system, planning, intelligence, and honest purpose, as well as perspiration. Seeming to do is not doing
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: At dawn, when you have trouble getting out of bed, tell yourself: "I have to go to work — as a human being
entrepreneurship.author: What do I have to complain of, if I’m going to do what I was born for — the things I was brought into the world to do? Or is this what I was created for? To huddle under the blankets and stay warm? Marcus Aurelius

entrepreneurship.quote: I think the thing about that was I was always willing to work; I was not the fastest or biggest player but I was determined to be the best football player I could be on the football field and I think I was able to accomplish that through hard work
entrepreneurship.author: Jerry Rice (Football superstar)

entrepreneurship.quote: I would rather risk wearing out than rusting out
entrepreneurship.author: Theodore Roosevelt

entrepreneurship.quote: There’s no talent here, this is hard work. This is an obsession
entrepreneurship.author: Conor McGregor (MMA Champion)

entrepreneurship.quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goals: my strength lies solely in my tenacity
entrepreneurship.author: Louis Pasteur

entrepreneurship.quote: If you have faith when you pray, you will be given whatever you ask for
entrepreneurship.author: Matthew 21:22, The Bible

entrepreneurship.quote: It’s hard work making movies. It’s like being a doctor: you work long hours, very hard hours, and it’s emotional, tense work. If you don’t really love it, then it ain’t worth it
entrepreneurship.author: George Lucas (Star Wars)

entrepreneurship.quote: If people knew how hard I worked to achieve my mastery, it wouldn’t seem so wonderful after all
entrepreneurship.author: Michelangelo

entrepreneurship.quote: I’m a designer, and I work very hard at that. People sometimes want to put down fashion by saying it’s frivolous or superficial, but it’s not that way at all. It’s actually very hard work
entrepreneurship.author: Donatella Versace

entrepreneurship.quote: To succeed, work hard, never give up and above all, cherish a magnificent obsession
entrepreneurship.author: Walt Disney

entrepreneurship.quote: No struggle, no progress, no success
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: Wake up determined. Go to bed satisfied
entrepreneurship.author: Dwayne Johnson (The Rock)

entrepreneurship.quote: Go and get your things. Dreams mean work
entrepreneurship.author: Paulo Coelho

entrepreneurship.quote: God sells us all things at the price of labor
entrepreneurship.author: Leonardo da Vinci

entrepreneurship.quote: Work without love is slavery
entrepreneurship.author: Mother Teresa

entrepreneurship.quote: Work harder than you think you did yesterday
entrepreneurship.author: Alex Elle

entrepreneurship.quote: Hard work does pay off
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Phelps

entrepreneurship.quote: Hard work teaches us that it takes more than hard work
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Butcher

entrepreneurship.quote: Nothing can beat hard work
entrepreneurship.author: Conor McGregor

entrepreneurship.quote: Never slow down for the world, one day it will catch-up with you
entrepreneurship.author: Nike

entrepreneurship.quote: Earned. Not given
entrepreneurship.author: Nike

entrepreneurship.quote: Work hard in silence; let success make the noise
entrepreneurship.author: Frank Ocean

entrepreneurship.quote: Light tomorrow with today
entrepreneurship.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

entrepreneurship.quote: I sweat in tears to get what I want
entrepreneurship.author: Lailah Akita

entrepreneurship.quote: Sore today, strong tomorrow
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: Be thankful for what you have. Work hard for what you don’t have
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: It hurts now but one day it will be your warm up
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: Work incessantly, but be not attached to it
entrepreneurship.author: Swami Vivekananda

entrepreneurship.quote: Look in the mirror – that’s your competition
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work
entrepreneurship.author: Iain Duncan Smith

entrepreneurship.quote: If you can’t outplay them, outwork them
entrepreneurship.author: Ben Hogan

entrepreneurship.quote: Start with a cry, end with a smile
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

entrepreneurship.quote: The first one gets the oyster the second gets the shell
entrepreneurship.author: Andrew Carnegie

entrepreneurship.quote: Work hard now, suffer and keep it up. Rewards are at the edge
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me, it’s who is going to stop me
entrepreneurship.author: Ayn Rand

entrepreneurship.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success
entrepreneurship.author: Pablo Picasso

entrepreneurship.quote: The cynics may be the loudest voices – but I promise you, they will accomplish the least
entrepreneurship.author: Barack Obama

entrepreneurship.quote: Amateurs have hard work and speed. Professionals have hard work, speed and direction
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: Hard work compounds like interest, and the earlier you do it, the more time you have for the benefits to pay off
entrepreneurship.author: Sam Altman

entrepreneurship.quote: A good idea is about ten percent and implementation and hard work, and luck is 90 percent
entrepreneurship.author: Guy Kawasaki

entrepreneurship.quote: Study while others are sleeping; work while others are loafing; prepare while others are playing; and dream while others are wishing. William A
entrepreneurship.author: Ward

entrepreneurship.quote: In order to master a field, you must love the subject and feel a profound connection to it. Your interest must transcend the field itself and border on the religious
entrepreneurship.author: Robert Greene

entrepreneurship.quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It’s the best part of the day
entrepreneurship.author: George Allen Sr

entrepreneurship.quote: When you find the right thing to do, and people to work with, invest deeply into that, and stick with it for decades
entrepreneurship.author: Naval Ravikant

entrepreneurship.quote: Shovel today’s challenges for your tomorrow’s freedom
entrepreneurship.author: Aniekee Ezekiel

entrepreneurship.quote: Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity
entrepreneurship.author: Seneca

entrepreneurship.quote: It does not matter where you are standing right now
entrepreneurship.author: Sanchita Pandey

entrepreneurship.quote: Inspiration usually comes during work rather than before it
entrepreneurship.author: Madeleine L’Engle

entrepreneurship.quote: I don’t like work – no man does – but I like what is in the work – the chance to find yourself. Your own reality – for yourself not for others – what no other man can ever know. They can only see the mere show, and never can tell what it really means
entrepreneurship.author: Joseph Conrad

entrepreneurship.quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they’re making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as punishment. And that’s the difference
entrepreneurship.author: Lou Holtz

entrepreneurship.quote: You can’t get there by bus, only by hard work and risk and by not quite knowing what you’re doing. What you’ll discover will be wonderful. What you’ll discover will be yourself
entrepreneurship.author: Alan Alda

entrepreneurship.quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work. Peter F
entrepreneurship.author: Drucker

entrepreneurship.quote: The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win
entrepreneurship.author: Roger Bannister (Ran the first sub-4-minute mile)

entrepreneurship.quote: Baby steps are better than no steps at all. Keep going. You’ll get there
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown (See also: Monday motivation quotes)

entrepreneurship.quote: You may not be there yet, but you’re closer than you were yesterday
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: When you feel like stopping think about why you started
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: My success was due to good luck, hard work, and support and advice from friends and mentors. But most importantly, it depended on me to keep trying after I had failed
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Warner

entrepreneurship.quote: Have a healthy disregard for the impossible and actually build new solutions
entrepreneurship.author: Larry Page

entrepreneurship.quote: I do not know anyone who has got to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but should get you pretty near
entrepreneurship.author: Margaret Thatcher

entrepreneurship.quote: To be successful you have to be selfish, or else you never achieve. And once you get to your highest level, then you have to be unselfish. Stay reachable. Stay in touch. Don’t isolate
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Jordan

entrepreneurship.quote: Work while you have the light. You are responsible for the talent that has been entrusted to you
entrepreneurship.author: Henri-Frederic Amiel

entrepreneurship.quote: Going all-in on something will make you feel alive and ultimately, satisfied
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: Everybody wants to be famous, but nobody wants to do the work. I live by that. You grind hard so you can play hard. At the end of the day, you put all the work in, and eventually it’ll pay off. It could be in a year, it could be in 30 years. Eventually, your hard work will pay off
entrepreneurship.author: Kevin Hart

entrepreneurship.quote: Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have
entrepreneurship.author: Ed Bradley

entrepreneurship.quote: Doing anything big and bold in life is hard work, and learning to persist (try, fail, learn, try again, etc.) is fundamental to any entrepreneur’s success
entrepreneurship.author: Peter Diamandis

entrepreneurship.quote: It seems like the world is crumbling out there, but it is actually a really great time in your life to get a little crazy, follow your curiosity and be ambitious about it
entrepreneurship.author: Larry Page

entrepreneurship.quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you’ll be able to see further
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Carlyle

entrepreneurship.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard
entrepreneurship.author: Kevin Durant

entrepreneurship.quote: The obstacle is the way
entrepreneurship.author: Ryan Holiday

entrepreneurship.quote: The more I want to get something done the less I call it work
entrepreneurship.author: Richard Bach

entrepreneurship.quote: I can accept failure. Everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Jordan

entrepreneurship.quote: Work as hard as you can. Even though who you work with and what you work on are more important than how hard you work
entrepreneurship.author: Naval Ravikant

entrepreneurship.quote: The better your feedback loop, the better your work. Businesses have the market. Novels have the readers. Science has experiments. It’s when the feedback loop is a small group of bosses or peers that quality falls apart
entrepreneurship.author: Naval Ravikant

entrepreneurship.quote: Hard work is an essential element in tracking down and perfecting a strategy or in executing it
entrepreneurship.author: Charlie Munger

entrepreneurship.quote: So often people are working hard at the wrong thing. Working on the right thing is probably more important than working hard
entrepreneurship.author: Caterina Fake

entrepreneurship.quote: In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you
entrepreneurship.author: Leo Tolstoy

entrepreneurship.quote: Amateurs are busy and tense. Professionals are calm and focused
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: To learn you must be willing to change. To change you must be willing to suffer. To suffer you must be willing to work
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: The problems you work on and who you work with are as important as how hard you work
entrepreneurship.author: Shane Parrish

entrepreneurship.quote: Those who aim at great deeds must also suffer greatly
entrepreneurship.author: Plutarch

entrepreneurship.quote: There’s no way around doing the work it takes to get you there
entrepreneurship.author: Joyce Chapman

entrepreneurship.quote: A man is not idle because he is absorbed in thought. There is visible labor and there is invisible labor
entrepreneurship.author: Victor Hugo

entrepreneurship.quote: Part 1. He does nothing with haste and drudgery, but as if he loved it. He makes the most of his labor, and takes infinite satisfaction in every part of it
entrepreneurship.author: Henry David Thoreau

entrepreneurship.quote: Part 2. He is not looking forward to the sale of his crops or any pecuniary profit, but he is paid by the constant satisfaction which his labor yields him
entrepreneurship.author: Henry David Thoreau

entrepreneurship.quote: Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven’t planted
entrepreneurship.author: David Bly

entrepreneurship.quote: To think is easy. To act is hard. But the hardest thing in the world is to act in accordance with your thinking
entrepreneurship.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

entrepreneurship.quote: Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there
entrepreneurship.author: Will Rogers

entrepreneurship.quote: People might not get all they work for in this world, but they must certainly work for all they get
entrepreneurship.author: Frederick Douglass

entrepreneurship.quote: Sometimes there’s not a better way. Sometimes there’s only the hard way. Mary E
entrepreneurship.author: Pearson

entrepreneurship.quote: Work and you’ll get what you need; work harder and you’ll get what you want
entrepreneurship.author: Prabakaran Thirumalai

entrepreneurship.quote: In dwelling, live close to the ground. In thinking, keep to the simple. In conflict, be fair and generous. In governing, don’t try to control. In work, do what you enjoy. In family life, be completely present
entrepreneurship.author: Lao Tzu

entrepreneurship.quote: Never let your work drive you. Master it and keep it in complete control. Booker T
entrepreneurship.author: Washington

entrepreneurship.quote: Don’t make excuses for why you can’t get it done. Focus on all the reasons why you must make it happen
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: Blood, sweat and respect. The first two you give, the last one you get
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did
entrepreneurship.author: Newt Gingrich

entrepreneurship.quote: Part 1
entrepreneurship.author: So you were born to feel "nice"? Instead of doing things and experiencing them? Marcus Aurelius

entrepreneurship.quote: Part 2
entrepreneurship.author: Don’t you see the plants, the birds, the ants and spiders and bees going about their individual tasks, putting the world in order, as best they can? Marcus Aurelius

entrepreneurship.quote: Part 3
entrepreneurship.author: And you’re not willing to do your job as a human being? Why aren’t you running to do what your nature demands? Marcus Aurelius

entrepreneurship.quote: If you accomplish something good with hard work, the labor passes quickly, but the good endures; if you do something shameful in pursuit of pleasure, the pleasure passes quickly, but the shame endures
entrepreneurship.author: Gaius Musonius Rufus

entrepreneurship.quote: I woult rather die of passion than of boredom
entrepreneurship.author: Émile Zola

entrepreneurship.quote: What we fear of doing most is usually what we most need to do
entrepreneurship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

entrepreneurship.quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today
entrepreneurship.author: Karen Lamb

entrepreneurship.quote: We did not come to fear the future. We came here to shape it
entrepreneurship.author: Barack Obama

entrepreneurship.quote: Nothing happens unless first a dream
entrepreneurship.author: Carl Sandburg

entrepreneurship.quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men
entrepreneurship.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

entrepreneurship.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts
entrepreneurship.author: Albert Einstein

entrepreneurship.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens
entrepreneurship.author: Carl Jung

entrepreneurship.quote: Dare to live the life you have dreamed for yourself. Go forward and make your dreams come true
entrepreneurship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

entrepreneurship.quote: A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities. J.R.R
entrepreneurship.author: Tolkien

entrepreneurship.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway
entrepreneurship.author: Earl Nightingale

entrepreneurship.quote: I like dreams of the future better than the history of the past
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Jefferson

entrepreneurship.quote: Dreams are the seedlings of realities
entrepreneurship.author: James Allen

entrepreneurship.quote: Don’t ever let someone tell you that you can’t do something. You got a dream, you gotta protect it. When people can’t do something themselves, they are going to tell you that you can’t do it. You want something, go get it. Period
entrepreneurship.author: Will Smith (Pursuit of Happyness)

entrepreneurship.quote: A man must dream a long time in order to act with grandeur, and dreaming is nursed in darkness
entrepreneurship.author: Jean Genet

entrepreneurship.quote: It may be that those who do most, dream most
entrepreneurship.author: Stephen Butler Leacock

entrepreneurship.quote: That which is dreamed can never be lost, can never be undreamed
entrepreneurship.author: Neil Gaiman

entrepreneurship.quote: You’ll stumble upon something you can’t stop thinking about, something more important than anything else. Make it the focus of your life
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: It’s difficult to follow your dream. It’s a tragedy not to
entrepreneurship.author: Ralph Marston

entrepreneurship.quote: If you give up on your dreams, what’s left?
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Carrey

entrepreneurship.quote: Fill your brain with giant dreams so it has no space for petty pursuits
entrepreneurship.author: Robin Sharma

entrepreneurship.quote: Freedom is the word that the human dream feeds on, that no one can explain nor fail to understand
entrepreneurship.author: Cecília Meireles

entrepreneurship.quote: If you’ve never stared off in the distance, then your life is a shame
entrepreneurship.author: Adam Duritz

entrepreneurship.quote: Yesterday’s dreams are often tomorrow’s realities
entrepreneurship.author: Bruce Lee

entrepreneurship.quote: Thought is the labor of the intellect, reverie is its pleasure
entrepreneurship.author: Victor Hugo

entrepreneurship.quote: We’re told that the American dream will bring you happiness, and it will not. I think a lot of us learn as we get older that happiness is internal. Happiness is a choice that you make and a skill that you develop
entrepreneurship.author: Naval Ravikant

entrepreneurship.quote: Make the action to move closer to your dream the first action you take each day
entrepreneurship.author: Leo Babauta

entrepreneurship.quote: Spread joy. Chase your wildest dreams
entrepreneurship.author: Patch Adams

entrepreneurship.quote: I don’t dream at night, I dream all day; I dream for a living
entrepreneurship.author: Steven Spielberg

entrepreneurship.quote: Dream is not that you see in the sleep; dream is that does not allow you to sleep. A. P. J
entrepreneurship.author: Abdul Kalam

entrepreneurship.quote: Genius is the ability to put into effect what is in your mind. There’s no other definition of it. F
entrepreneurship.author: Scott Fitzgerald

entrepreneurship.quote: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edward Lawrence

entrepreneurship.quote: You’re alive, Bod. That means you have infinite potential. You can do anything, make anything, dream anything
entrepreneurship.author: Neil Gaiman (The Graveyard Book)

entrepreneurship.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live. J.K
entrepreneurship.author: Rowling

entrepreneurship.quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams
entrepreneurship.author: John Barrymore

entrepreneurship.quote: Sometimes, in a summer morning, having taken my accustomed bath, I sat in my sunny doorway from sunrise till noon, rapt in reverie
entrepreneurship.author: Henry David Thoreau

entrepreneurship.quote: Reverie is not a mind vacuum. It is rather the gift of an hour which knows the plenitude of the soul
entrepreneurship.author: Gaston Bachelard

entrepreneurship.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe
entrepreneurship.author: Anatole France

entrepreneurship.quote: Anyone who dreams of an uncommon life eventually discovers that there is no choice but to seek an uncommon approach to living it
entrepreneurship.author: Gary Keller (The ONE Thing)

entrepreneurship.quote: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it
entrepreneurship.author: Buddha

entrepreneurship.quote: We dream to give ourselves hope. To stop dreaming – well, that’s like saying you can never change your fate
entrepreneurship.author: Amy Tan

entrepreneurship.quote: I believe in everything until it’s disproved. So I believe in fairies, the myths, dragons. It all exists, even if it’s in your mind
entrepreneurship.author: Who’s to say that dreams and nightmares aren’t as real as the here and now? John Lennon

entrepreneurship.quote: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to
entrepreneurship.author: Kahlil Gibran

entrepreneurship.quote: Dream what you dare to dream. Go where you want to go. Be what you want to be
entrepreneurship.author: Earl Nightingale

entrepreneurship.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
entrepreneurship.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

entrepreneurship.quote: You can kill the dreamer, but you can’t kill the dream
entrepreneurship.author: Martin Luther King Jr

entrepreneurship.quote: I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams
entrepreneurship.author: Oprah Winfrey

entrepreneurship.quote: I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character
entrepreneurship.author: Martin Luther King Jr

entrepreneurship.quote: You see things; and you say, ‘Why?’ But I dream things that never were; and I say, ‘Why not?’
entrepreneurship.author: George Bernard Shaw

entrepreneurship.quote: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I’m a dreamer, but I’m not the only one. I hope someday you’ll join us, and the world will live as one
entrepreneurship.author: John Lennon

entrepreneurship.quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere
entrepreneurship.author: Albert Einstein

entrepreneurship.quote: Ambition is a dream with a V8 engine
entrepreneurship.author: Elvis Presley

entrepreneurship.quote: It was all a dream.
entrepreneurship.author: The Notorious B.I.G

entrepreneurship.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it
entrepreneurship.author: Walt Disney

entrepreneurship.quote: We grow great by dreams. All big men are dreamers. They see things in the soft haze of a spring day or in the red fire of a long winter’s evening. Some of us let these great dreams die, but others nourish and protect them; nurse them through bad days till they bring them to the sunshine and light which comes always to those who sincerely hope that their dreams will come true
entrepreneurship.author: Woodrow Wilson

entrepreneurship.quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on, and our little life is rounded with a sleep
entrepreneurship.author: Williams Shakespeare

entrepreneurship.quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream
entrepreneurship.author: Edgar Allen Poe

entrepreneurship.quote: A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes
entrepreneurship.author: Mahatma Gandhi

entrepreneurship.quote: Study while others are sleeping; work while others are loafing; prepare while others are playing; and dream while others are wishing
entrepreneurship.author: William Arthur Ward

entrepreneurship.quote: Fashion is about dreaming and making other people dream
entrepreneurship.author: Donatella Versace

entrepreneurship.quote: I dream my painting and I paint my dream
entrepreneurship.author: Vincent van Gogh

entrepreneurship.quote: I paint objects as I think them, not as I see them
entrepreneurship.author: Pablo Picasso

entrepreneurship.quote: A dream doesn’t become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work
entrepreneurship.author: Colin Powell

entrepreneurship.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true. A. P. J
entrepreneurship.author: Abdul Kalam

entrepreneurship.quote: You can’t put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Phelps

entrepreneurship.quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up
entrepreneurship.author: Muhammad Ali

entrepreneurship.quote: Sometimes a dream almost whispers, it never shouts. So you have to, every day of your lives, be ready to hear what whispers in your ear
entrepreneurship.author: Steven Spielberg

entrepreneurship.quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else
entrepreneurship.author: Erma Bombeck

entrepreneurship.quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever. Live as if you’ll die today
entrepreneurship.author: James Dean

entrepreneurship.quote: Never give up on your dreams
entrepreneurship.author: Barack Obama

entrepreneurship.quote: Dreams come true
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: I dwell in possibility
entrepreneurship.author: Emily Dickinson

entrepreneurship.quote: Hope is a waking dream
entrepreneurship.author: Aristotle

entrepreneurship.quote: Explore. Dream. Discover
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Twain

entrepreneurship.quote: Dreams are necessary to life
entrepreneurship.author: Anais Nin

entrepreneurship.quote: Let your dreams be your wings
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: In dreams begins responsibility. W. B
entrepreneurship.author: Yeats

entrepreneurship.quote: You get one life. Make it count
entrepreneurship.author: Shane Parrish

entrepreneurship.quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do. John C
entrepreneurship.author: Maxwell

entrepreneurship.quote: Dream big. Start small. Act now
entrepreneurship.author: Robin Sharma

entrepreneurship.quote: Swim out of your little pond
entrepreneurship.author: Rumi

entrepreneurship.quote: Think, believe, dream, and dare
entrepreneurship.author: Walt Disney

entrepreneurship.quote: I don’t chase dreams, I hunt goals
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: Face reality or escape with a dream
entrepreneurship.author: Maxime Lagacé

entrepreneurship.quote: Never leave your dreams unfulfilled
entrepreneurship.author: James Clear

entrepreneurship.quote: Man is a genius when he is dreaming
entrepreneurship.author: Akira Kurosawa

entrepreneurship.quote: In dreams I have achieved everything
entrepreneurship.author: Fernando Pessoa

entrepreneurship.quote: The journey is essential to the dream
entrepreneurship.author: Francis of Assisi

entrepreneurship.quote: Don’t call it a dream, call it a plan
entrepreneurship.author: Unknown

entrepreneurship.quote: Don’t tell people your dreams, show them

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure.

entrepreneurship.quote: The road to success is always under construction.

entrepreneurship.quote: Anything the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

entrepreneurship.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.

entrepreneurship.quote: Whether you think you can or you can't, you're right.

entrepreneurship.quote: Failure defeats losers, failure inspires winners.

entrepreneurship.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

entrepreneurship.quote: The biggest failure you can have in life is not trying at all.

entrepreneurship.quote: I honestly think it is better to be a failure at something you love than to be a success at something you hate.

entrepreneurship.quote: Example is not the main thing in influencing other people; it's the only thing.

entrepreneurship.quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.

entrepreneurship.quote: The difference between a boss and a leader: a boss says, ‘Go!' -a leader says, ‘Let's go!'.

entrepreneurship.quote: I am more afraid of an army of one hundred sheep led by a lion than an army of one hundred lions led by a sheep.

entrepreneurship.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
entrepreneurship.author: Aristotle

entrepreneurship.quote: Cannibals prefer those who have no spines.
entrepreneurship.author: Stanislaw Lem

entrepreneurship.quote: A ship in harbor is safe. But that's now what ships are built for.
entrepreneurship.author: William Shedd

entrepreneurship.quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
